description: Hello, I'm Josh! I'm currently in my second year at Swansea University, studying towards a degree in Computer Science. I'm passionate about solving problems with efficient, clean and readable code. /n /n My mindset as a software engineer is to always be a student, I'm eager to learn new skills and always improve. Currently, my short term goal is getting an internship as a software engineer throughout the summer of 2021. Please contact me with any opportunities!!  /n /n On a side note, I'm interested in space, along with space exploration and also enjoy listening to podcasts as well as watching documentaries. /n /n Below are some technologies that I use regularly.
